about_the_game:
The city of Zlorp.

A haven for criminals, gangs, and thugs.

You are Lir, a humble delivery boy who gets caught in the wrong place at the wrong time, or so you tell yourself.

An unlabeled box to be delivered to Blizgob, one of the most dangerous criminal overlords in Zlorp. Turns out it was a shipment of the hardest drugs in the galaxy, Glob...

...but you knew that already, you just didn't want to admit it because the payment was too good to turn down.

So have at it. Make your deliveries. Swag out your apartment. Build yourself up. It's impossible not to turn to crime here...

Cause in this city, crime is a way of life... and death.
detailed_description:
The city of Zlorp.

A haven for criminals, gangs, and thugs.

You are Lir, a humble delivery boy who gets caught in the wrong place at the wrong time, or so you tell yourself.

An unlabeled box to be delivered to Blizgob, one of the most dangerous criminal overlords in Zlorp. Turns out it was a shipment of the hardest drugs in the galaxy, Glob...

...but you knew that already, you just didn't want to admit it because the payment was too good to turn down.

So have at it. Make your deliveries. Swag out your apartment. Build yourself up. It's impossible not to turn to crime here...

Cause in this city, crime is a way of life... and death.
name: Dystopian Nights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD or built in graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce MX150 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
